text: Hans-Jürgen Krupp (born 15 April 1933) is a German politician and economist. He was the President of the University of Frankfurt. He was a representative of the Social Democratic Party (SPD) and state minister in Hamburg. In 1988 Krupp became state minister of Finance, and in 1991 state minister for Economic Affairs and second mayor of Hamburg. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Hamburg Category:German economists Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Academics of Goethe University Frankfurt
title: Hans-Jürgen Krupp
